Perinatal POEM (Patient rated Outcome and Experience Measure)
We are always looking to improve the quality of the service we provide. To help us to do this we would be grateful if you could give us your views regarding the service you have received from us.

If you have a partner, or someone who has been closely involved in supporting you, who would also like to express their views on the care we offered you please encourage them to also fill in a questionnaire. If you are a partner/other please note than when answering questions, ‘me’, ‘my’ or ‘you’ refers to the mum/patient.
Please answer ALL questions. Your answers will be used to help the team to improve the service and will be completely anonymous so will not affect the care you receive.
